OOC: I scanned my inbox but I didn't get your email Preston, looks like ano=
ther offline glitch.  I checked my spam folder too, nothing was there.  Any=
way, what we got going on is pretty good so far.  It'll take a little time =
but it'll play out good.

BIC: Collective post.

Tucson Prime knew he had h=
is work cut out for him.  It wouldn't be easy attempting to turn Rodimus ar=
ound.  He simply sighs, and does not give anyone the satisfaction of losing=
 his temper.  The less he expressed his disdain, the more he hoped to cause=
 a bit of frustration among his captives.  He had an old saying.  "Don't ge=
t mad, use your strongest of attributes and talents to passively retaliate =
against your enemies.   

"Ohh well, I may be in trouble for a while, and i=
t wouldn't be the first time."

He shrugs Rodimus off casually.

Outside th=
e fortress, Rat Trap gets Lord Elder's message, and replies.

" Lord Elder,=
 sorry for not gettn' back ta ya so soon.  We had a little glitch in our ba=
ttle plans...  Tucson Prime told us ta stay outside the fortress, and we di=
d, and when he went inside with Kup ta try'n get Nightshift out, he got cap=
tured, again.  But this time I think he wanted ta get captured..  Some sort=
a new strategy he's tryn' out.  As for us... I - dunno but Quickstride's go=
t that look in his eyes.. He's itchn' for a fight. Normally I would just st=
ay out of it, but, ya know somethn', I'm itchn' for some payback too.  Whee=
ls is in there and he's givn' it his all!  The least we can do is return th=
e favor and do our part out here.  We'll keep the com link open sir, so tha=
t way ya know we're still with ya.... Nowwwww, let's see, I'm on your back =
Quickstride and when you get your hooves movn' you get 'em movn'...  All we=
 need is a long piece of metal and we got ourselves a lance...  Get my drif=
t?"

Quickstride nodds.

" My charge, your lance....  Ohhh yeahh I do.  The=
 old Jousting game. But remember, as Maximals, we don't make any moves unle=
ss we're attacked first."

Rat Trap nodds.  He spots something.  A long pip=
e like object that appears to be a broken off piece of pipe from some form =
of fallen aircraft.  It proves to not have rusted and in good condition.  H=
e scans the ground and finds what looks like a pointed missile head, perhap=
s from a missile that had not fired.  He puts the two of them together and =
with a small welding tool, he fashions a make shift lance.

"What'dya think=
?"

Quickstride grins.

" That'll do."

Rat Trap grins also.

" Rat Trap Ma=
ximize."

He gets into his robot mode, and gets up onto Quickstride's back,=
 holding the lance in his left hand while holding onto Quickstride's mane w=
ith the other.  He then realizes that one more thing is missing.  A shield.=


"Forgot the shield."

Quickstride sniffs at a broken off door of a vehicl=
e.

"Found one."

Rat Trap is given the car door.  He now tries to hold on =
with his legs, rather than hands.

"Woahh, I dunno how this is gonna work b=
ig guy..  Guess we'll find out eventually."  

Quickstride faces the fortre=
ss, and stands his ground.  The wind blows breezes through his mane as he l=
ooks onward, ears forward.

"Remember Rat Trap, we don't make any moves unl=
ess they come after us first."

Back in the fortress in a different cell, N=
ight Shift keeps an ear out on what goes on behind the door.  He calmly rem=
embers all of his ninjabot training, and a few hand excercises he had been =
taught to make his wrists more limber and fluid.  He had hoped that these w=
ould accidentally, on purpose slip one of his hands if not both out of his =
restraints and be able to slip them back in at a moment's notice, then back=
 out without anyone ever catching onto him.  Without a word, he keeps his e=
yes open, not one ounce of body language, and attempts his excercises he ha=
d learned from his mentor, Prowl.  He thinks to himself while attempting it=
.

" Okay Prowl, I ain't done this one in a while, let's see if I remember =
that little excercise ya taught me..."
